about_the_game:
Empire in Decay is a roguelike deckbuilding turn-based tactical game, loosely based on chess. Its gameplay has been broadened with the use of cards and the progression of units. In the game, you'll proceed through procedurally generated routes across the districts of Daandria, the capital of the Empire.
In your journey to the Throne Hall to face the King, you will have to fight turn-based combats through different locations, collect cards and upgrade them, recruit units to support your cause and enhance them, find relics and forge artifacts to boost your powers, and use all your cunning and skill to make your way through waves of enemies.

FEATURES

  • 6 different factions to choose from, primary and supporting, each with its unique starting deck and characteristic playstyle.

  • Discover +200 cards to upgrade and make your deck more effective

  • Recruit +30 units with unique progression paths

  • Retrieve +150 ítems to gear up your faction and create new interactions with your cards and units

  • Explore a grim city divided into different districts, and choose your path wisely to try to reach the Throne Hall

  • Discover intrigues and useful information in events scattered throughout the city, that can improve or worsen your chances of triumph

  • Fight your way through procedurally generated combat situations to test the consistency of your deck and strategic skills

content_descriptors.notes:
The game shows scenes of violence and war. The game characters perform violent attacks on each other and frequently kill them.
The game also depicts objects used to consume tobacco (a pipe) or alcohol (a tankard) but characters don't appear consuming it anywhere.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Multicore with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB DX9 (shader model 3.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Start a rebellion and fight turn-based tactical combats in this roguelike deckbuilder. Upgrade your units and cards wisely. You will need it to progress through the districts of Daandria, the city where the tyrant king awaits you. Save this Empire in Decay.
